## Role.SubclassOf type

All roles that are subclasses of the specified role.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type SubclassOf<N extends Name> = {
        [M in Name]: N extends SuperclassOf<M> ? M : never;
    }[Name];
```
<b>References:</b> [Name](./alfa-aria.role_namespace.name_typealias.md)<!-- -->, [SuperclassOf](./alfa-aria.role_namespace.superclassof_typealias.md)
